ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] eq2
ygData.msgSnippet: ... well, that also will be 18 months to save up some money. i wonder if i really will be playing with four accounts and threee systems at this time ... ;-)
ygData.messageBody:
Richard Skelton wrote:

> A friend posted this to me, and i thought it may intrerest some people on this list..
> [...]
> Wow, 18 months. That's a lot of freaking news roundups.


well, that also will be 18 months to save up some money.


i wonder if i really will be playing with four accounts
and threee systems at this time ... ;-)

maybe it will also be the time for a change again!

i really can't wait until Asheron's Call 2 will be availible.
maybe Star Wars Galaxies will also be something interesting.

well, let's wait and see ...

Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 52 female gnome magician
Tarew Marr
